name: ESTATE of Margaret B. ROGERS, Deceased, by Robert W. Rogers, Executor v. George TARR et ux.

judges: Before EAGEN, J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, C. J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: ESTATE of Margaret B. ROGERS, Deceased, by Robert W. Rogers, Executor v. George TARR et ux.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Appeal quashed as interlocutory. Reid v. Housing Authority of Pittsburgh, 461 Pa. 470, 336 A.2d 882 (filed May 13, 1975); Ridge Radio Corporation v. Glosser, 417 Pa. 450, 208 A.2d 839 (1965).
Appellant to bear costs.
JONES, C. J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Jack H. France, Murphy & France, Charleroi, for appellant.
Paul N. Barna, Barna & Barna, Donora, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
339 A.2d 760
ESTATE of Margaret B. ROGERS, Deceased, by Robert W. Rogers, Executor v. George TARR et ux.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 4, 1974.
Decided July 7, 1975.
Jack H. France, Murphy & France, Charleroi, for appellant.
Paul N. Barna, Barna & Barna, Donora, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
